content.rendered:
Directed by Amit Ravindernath Sharma

Written by Akshat Ghildial. Akshat Ghildial. Jyoti Kapoor. Shantanu Srivastava

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana (Nakul Kaushik). Neena Gupta (Priyamvada Kaushik). Nayim Saifi (Friend). Gajraj Rao (Jeetender Kaushik). Sanya Malhotra (Renee Sharma). Surekha Sikri (Durga Devi Kaushik). Sheeba Chaddha (Sangeeta Sharma). Shardul Rana (Gullar Kausik). Rahul Tewari (Junaa). Arun Kalra (Sunil Ji) . Alka Amin (Veerendra’s Wife). Backagaindancer (Sharma Ji). Manoj Bakshi (Veerendra). Tarun Bali (Chawla). Sobbie Bawa (Rahul (credit only)). Vivek Dagar (Sumit malik). Shatakshi Gupta (Neighbor).Anuj Gurjar. Alka Badola Kaushal (Guddan (Nakul’s Aunt)). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Vimi Mehta (Doctor Gyne). Monika Misra (Senior Surgeon). Vishal Parekh (Vishal). Umair Patel (Musical Artist). Ratheesh Balakrishnan Poduval (Husband (Clinic Lobby)). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). Skand Rawat (Gullar’s friend). Farabi Md Refat (Nitesh Nakul). Sanyam Seth (Gullar’s friend). Raj Sharma (Bobby bhai)

Language Hindi

Producers Tarun Bali. Hemant Bhandari. Vineet Jain. Alok Kumar. Aneesh Mohan. Ravi Sarin. Aleya Sen. Priti Shahani. Amit Ravindernath Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty

Production Chrome Picture. Junglee Picture
